name: libra_nodejs_grpc
description: Test gRPC Nodejs project w/ Libra protobufs
author: Jake Casaletto

scripts.test-libra-env-var: if [ -z "$LIBRA" ]; then echo "\$LIBRA environment variable missing."; echo "Please set \$LIBRA to the Libra Core root path"; exit 1; fi
scripts.setup: npm install && mkdir -p dist && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/proto && rm -rf src/proto/* && mkdir -p src/proto/flowtypes npm run build-protos
scripts.build: npm run clean && cp -rf src/* dist/*
scripts.build-protos: npm run test-libra-env-var && rm -rf ./src/flowtypes/* && echo "Flow-typing Libra protobuf files..."; projdir=$(pwd); find "$LIBRA" -name "*.proto" -execdir protoc --plugin="protoc-gen-flow=$projdir/node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-flow" --js_out="import_style=commonjs,binary:$projdir/src/proto" --flow_out="$projdir/src/proto/flowtypes"  {}  \;
